19 void ElionPlanner::preSolve(robot_model::RobotModelConstPtr robot_model, const std::string& group,
20  const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& ps,
21  planning_interface::MotionPlanRequest request)
22 {
23  num_dofs_ = robot_model->getJointModelGroup(group)->getVariableCount();
24 
25  state_space_ = std::make_shared<ob::RealVectorStateSpace>(num_dofs_);
26  ob::RealVectorBounds bounds(num_dofs_);
27  bounds.setLow(-2 * M_PI);
28  bounds.setHigh(2 * M_PI);
29  state_space_->setBounds(bounds);
30 
31  constraints_ = createConstraint(robot_model, group, request.path_constraints);
32  if (!constraints_)
33  {
34  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Failed to create constraints");
35  return;
36  }
37 
38  constrained_state_space_ = std::make_shared<ob::ProjectedStateSpace>(state_space_, constraints_);
39  constrained_state_space_info_ = std::make_shared<ob::ConstrainedSpaceInformation>(constrained_state_space_);
40 
41  simple_setup_ = std::make_shared<og::SimpleSetup>(constrained_state_space_info_);
42 
43  planner_ = std::make_shared<og::RRTConnect>(constrained_state_space_info_);
44 
45  simple_setup_->setPlanner(planner_);
46 
47  simple_setup_->setStateValidityChecker(
48  std::make_shared<MoveItCollisionChecker>(constrained_state_space_info_, robot_model, group, ps));
49 }
50 
51 bool ElionPlanner::solve(const Eigen::Ref<const Eigen::VectorXd>& start_joint_positions,
52  const Eigen::Ref<const Eigen::VectorXd>& goal_joint_positions, double allowed_planning_time)
53 {
54  ob::ScopedState<> start(constrained_state_space_);
55  ob::ScopedState<> goal(constrained_state_space_);
56 
57  start->as<ob::ConstrainedStateSpace::StateType>()->copy(start_joint_positions);
58  goal->as<ob::ConstrainedStateSpace::StateType>()->copy(goal_joint_positions);
59  simple_setup_->setStartAndGoalStates(start, goal);
60 
61  // solving it
62  simple_setup_->setup();
63  ob::PlannerStatus stat = simple_setup_->solve(allowed_planning_time);
64  if (stat)
65  {
66  return true;
67  }
68  else
69  {
70  OMPL_WARN("No solution found!");
71  return false;
72  }
73 }
74 
75 bool ElionPlanner::checkSolution()
76 {
77  if (solution_path_.size() < 2)
78  {
79  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("There is no solution path to check.");
80  return false;
81  }
82 
83  const double constraint_tolerance{ constraints_->getTolerance() };
84  Eigen::VectorXd constraint_violation{ constraints_->getCoDimension() };
85 
86  for (auto& q : solution_path_)
87  {
88  constraints_->function(q, constraint_violation);
89  for (std::size_t dim{ 0 }; dim < constraint_violation.size(); ++dim)
90  {
91  if (std::abs(constraint_violation[dim]) > constraint_tolerance)
92  {
93  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Constraints violated along the path for dimension " << dim << " at state: ");
94  ROS_INFO_STREAM(q.transpose());
95  ROS_INFO_STREAM(constraint_violation.transpose());
96  return false;
97  }
98  }
99  }
100  return true;
101 }
102 
103 void ElionPlanner::postSolve()
104 {
105  simple_setup_->simplifySolution(5.);
106  auto path = simple_setup_->getSolutionPath();
107  path.interpolate();
108 
109  // path.printAsMatrix(std::cout);
110  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Writing path from OMPL to generic format.");
111 
112  // write path to generic format indepenent from OMPL to pass it to ROS?
113  solution_path_.clear();
114  for (auto& state : path.getStates())
115  {
116  const Eigen::Map<Eigen::VectorXd>& x = *state->as<ob::ConstrainedStateSpace::StateType>();
117 
118  Eigen::VectorXd joint_position(x);
119  solution_path_.push_back(joint_position);
120  }
121 
122  // bool is_path_valid = path.check();
123  bool is_path_valid = checkSolution();
124  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Is OMPL interpolation valid? " << (is_path_valid ? "yes" : "no"));
125 }
126 } // namespace elion
